trans-unit.source: An Azure internal load balancer (ILB) provides network load balancing between virtual machines that reside inside a cloud service, or a virtual network with a regional scope.
trans-unit.target: An Azure internal load balancer (ILB) provides network load balancing between virtual machines that reside inside a cloud service, or a virtual network with a regional scope.

trans-unit.source: For information about the use and configuration of virtual networks with a regional scope, see [Regional Virtual Networks](../articles/virtual-network/virtual-networks-migrate-to-regional-vnet.md).
trans-unit.target: For information about the use and configuration of virtual networks with a regional scope, see [Regional Virtual Networks](../articles/virtual-network/virtual-networks-migrate-to-regional-vnet.md).

trans-unit.source: Existing virtual networks that have been configured for an affinity group cannot use ILB.
trans-unit.target: Existing virtual networks that have been configured for an affinity group cannot use ILB.
